automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_wled_pulse_21_23'
alias: Living Room Lights - Office WLED Pulse 21-23
description: "When Living Room light turns on between 21:00 and 23:00, briefly turn on Office WLED at low brightness, then off"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.living_room_2
    from: 'off'
    to: 'on'
conditions:
  - condition: time
    after: '21:00:00'
    before: '23:00:00'
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_pulse
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 20
  - delay: '00:00:10'
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_pulse

issues.recommendation: Verify entity scene.office_wled_before_pulse exists in Home Assistant. This entity was not validated during generation - consider using a validated entity instead.

warnings.recommendation: Verify entity scene.office_wled_before_pulse exists in Home Assistant. This entity was not validated during generation - consider using a validated entity instead.
